recipe.name: Classic Creamy Hummus
recipe.description: Smooth, creamy hummus with the perfect blend of tahini, garlic, and lemon. Better than store-bought and ready in 5 minutes!
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) chickpeas, drained and rinsed
2 tablespoons olive oil, plus more for drizzling
recipe.instructions:
1. Reserve a few chickpeas for garnish. Add remaining chickpeas to food processor.

2. Add tahini, garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin, and salt.

3. Blend for 1 minute until smooth and creamy.

4. With processor running, slowly add water 1 tablespoon at a time until you reach desired consistency. Hummus should be smooth and spreadable.

5. Taste and adjust seasonings. Want more lemon? Garlic? Salt? Add it!

6. Transfer to serving bowl. Create a well in the center with the back of a spoon.

7. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with paprika. Top with reserved chickpeas and parsley.

8. Serve with pita bread, vegetables, or crackers. Store in airtight container in fridge for up to 1 week.
recipe.notes: For extra-smooth hummus, peel the chickpeas (yes, it's tedious but worth it!). Don't have tahini? Substitute with peanut butter or almond butter. For garlic lovers, roast the garlic first for a milder, sweeter flavor.
